Consumer.description: Defines the data contract of a consumer.

authenticationType.description: Gets or sets this consumer's authentication type.

description.description: Gets or sets this consumer's localized description.

externalConfiguration.description: Non-null only if subscriptions for this consumer are configured externally.

id.description: Gets or sets this consumer's identifier.

imageUrl.description: Gets or sets this consumer's image URL, if any.

informationUrl.description: Gets or sets this consumer's information URL, if any.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets this consumer's input descriptors.

name.description: Gets or sets this consumer's localized name.

ConsumerAction.description: Defines the data contract of a consumer action.

allowResourceVersionOverride.description: Gets or sets the flag indicating if resource version can be overridden when creating or editing a subscription.

consumerId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the consumer to which this action belongs.

description.description: Gets or sets this action's localized description.

id.description: Gets or sets this action's identifier.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets this action's input descriptors.

name.description: Gets or sets this action's localized name.

supportedEventTypes.description: Gets or sets this action's supported event identifiers.

supportedResourceVersions.description: Gets or sets this action's supported resource versions.

Event.description: Encapsulates the properties of an event.

createdDate.description: Gets or sets the UTC-based date and time that this event was created.

detailedMessage.description: Gets or sets the detailed message associated with this event.

eventType.description: Gets or sets the type of this event.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of this event.

message.description: Gets or sets the (brief) message associated with this event.

publisherId.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the publisher that raised this event.

resource.description: Gets or sets the data associated with this event.

resourceContainers.description: Gets or sets the resource containers.

resourceVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the data associated with this event.

scope.description: Gets or sets the scope for this event.

sessionToken.description: Gets or sets the Session Token that can be used in further interactions

description.description: A localized description of the event type

id.description: A unique id for the event type

name.description: A localized friendly name for the event type

publisherId.description: A unique id for the publisher of this event type

scope.description: Gets or sets the scope for this event.

supportedResourceVersions.description: Supported versions for the event's resource payloads.

ExternalConfigurationDescriptor.description: Describes how to configure a subscription that is managed externally.

createSubscriptionUrl.description: Url of the site to create this type of subscription.

editSubscriptionPropertyName.description: The name of an input property that contains the URL to edit a subscription.

hostedOnly.description: True if the external configuration applies only to hosted.

FormattedEventMessage.description: Provides different formats of an event message

html.description: Gets or sets the html format of the message

markdown.description: Gets or sets the markdown format of the message

text.description: Gets or sets the raw text of the message

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputFilter.description: Defines a filter for subscription inputs. The filter matches a set of inputs if any (one or more) of the groups evaluates to true.

conditions.description: Groups of input filter expressions. This filter matches a set of inputs if any (one or more) of the groups evaluates to true.

InputFilterCondition.description: An expression which can be applied to filter a list of subscription inputs

caseSensitive.description: Whether or not to do a case sensitive match

inputId.description: The Id of the input to filter on

inputValue.description: The "expected" input value to compare with the actual input value

operator.description: The operator applied between the expected and actual input value

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

inputValues.description: The input values to return on input, and the result from the consumer on output.

resource.description: Subscription containing information about the publisher/consumer and the current input values

Notification.description: Defines the data contract of the result of processing an event for a subscription.

createdDate.description: Gets or sets date and time that this result was created.

eventId.description: The event id associated with this notification

modifiedDate.description: Gets or sets date and time that this result was last modified.

subscriberId.description: The subscriber Id  associated with this notification. This is the last identity who touched in the subscription. In case of test notifications it can be the tester if the subscription is not created yet.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id associated with this notification

NotificationDetails.description: Defines the data contract of notification details.

completedDate.description: Gets or sets the time that this notification was completed (response received from the consumer)

consumerActionId.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's consumer action identifier.

consumerId.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's consumer identifier.

consumerInputs.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's consumer inputs.

dequeuedDate.description: Gets or sets the time that this notification was dequeued for processing

errorDetail.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's error detail.

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's error message.

event.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's event content.

eventType.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's event type.

processedDate.description: Gets or sets the time that this notification was finished processing (just before the request is sent to the consumer)

publisherId.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's publisher identifier.

publisherInputs.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's publisher inputs.

queuedDate.description: Gets or sets the time that this notification was queued (created)

request.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's request.

requestAttempts.description: Number of requests attempted to be sent to the consumer

requestDuration.description: Duration of the request to the consumer in seconds

response.description: Gets or sets this notification detail's reponse.

NotificationResultsSummaryDetail.description: Summary of a particular result and count.

notificationCount.description: Count of notification sent out with a matching result.

NotificationsQuery.description: Defines a query for service hook notifications.

associatedSubscriptions.description: The subscriptions associated with the notifications returned from the query

includeDetails.description: If true, we will return all notification history for the query provided; otherwise, the summary is returned.

maxCreatedDate.description: Optional maximum date at which the notification was created

maxResults.description: Optional maximum number of overall results to include

maxResultsPerSubscription.description: Optional maximum number of results for each subscription. Only takes effect when a list of subscription ids is supplied in the query.

minCreatedDate.description: Optional minimum date at which the notification was created

publisherId.description: Optional publisher id to restrict the results to

resultType.description: Optional notification result type to filter results to

status.description: Optional notification status to filter results to

subscriptionIds.description: Optional list of subscription ids to restrict the results to

summary.description: Summary of notifications - the count of each result type (success, fail, ..).

NotificationSummary.description: Summary of the notifications for a subscription.

results.description: The notification results for this particular subscription.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id associated with this notification

Publisher.description: Defines the data contract of an event publisher.

serviceInstanceType.description: The service instance type of the first party publisher.

supportedEvents.description: Gets this publisher's supported event types.

PublisherEvent.description: Wrapper around an event which is being published

diagnostics.description: Add key/value pairs which will be stored with a published notification in the SH service DB.  This key/value pairs are for diagnostic purposes only and will have not effect on the delivery of a notificaton.

notificationId.description: Gets or sets the id of the notification.

otherResourceVersions.description: Gets or sets the array of older supported resource versions.

publisherInputFilters.description: Optional publisher-input filters which restricts the set of subscriptions which are triggered by the event

PublishersQuery.description: Defines a query for service hook publishers.

publisherIds.description: Optional list of publisher ids to restrict the results to

scope.description: Limit the events associated with this publisher based on the scope.

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.  Example: { self: { href: "http://localhost:8080/tfs/DefaultCollection/_apis/wit/workItems/1" } }

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

ResourceContainer.description: The base class for all resource containers, i.e. Account, Collection, Project

baseUrl.description: Gets or sets the container's base URL, i.e. the URL of the host (collection, application, or deploument) containing the container resource.

id.description: Gets or sets the container's specific Id.

name.description: Gets or sets the container's name.

url.description: Gets or sets the container's REST API URL.

SessionToken.description: Represents a session token to be attached in Events for Consumer actions that need it.

error.description: The error message in case of error

SubscriptionsQuery.description: Defines a query for service hook subscriptions.

consumerActionId.description: Optional consumer action id to restrict the results to (null for any)

consumerId.description: Optional consumer id to restrict the results to (null for any)

eventType.description: Optional event type id to restrict the results to (null for any)

publisherId.description: Optional publisher id to restrict the results to (null for any)

VersionedResource.description: Encapsulates the resource version and its data or reference to the compatible version. Only one of the two last fields should be not null.

compatibleWith.description: Gets or sets the reference to the compatible version.

resource.description: Gets or sets the resource data.

resourceVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the resource data.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '4.0-preview' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
